article.title: Carlson Assigned to Reserve Affairs, U.S. Army Corps of Engineers
article.text: Brig. Gen. Robert D. Carlson, USAR, has been assigned as deputy commanding general, Reserve Affairs (Individual Mobilization Augmentee), U.S. Army Corps of Engineers, Washington, D.C.; and deputy commanding general, Transatlantic Division, U.S. Army Corps of Engineers, Winchester, Virginia.
